## 2. Load data to R

```{r}

data_raw <- read.dta("./ZA7500_v3-0-0.dta/ZA7500_v3-0-0.dta")
head(data_raw)
nrow(data_raw)


```

## 3. Clean and save new dataset

```{r}

# select variables of interest

vars <- c("country", "v72", "v80", "age", "v225", "v243_r")

data_final <- data_raw %>% 
    select(vars) %>% 
    filter(age >=0) %>% 
    filter(v72 == "agree strongly"|v72 == "agree"|
               v72 == "disagree"|v72 == "disagree strongly") %>% 
    filter(v80 == "agree strongly"|v80 == "agree"|v80 == "neither agree nor disagree"|
               v80 == "disagree"|v80 == "disagree strongly") %>% 
    filter(v225 == "male"|v225 == "female") %>% 
    filter(v243_r == "lower"|v243_r == "medium"|v243_r == "higher") %>% 
    rename(working_mom = v72,
           immigrant_job = v80,
           male = v225,
           education = v243_r) %>% 
    mutate(male = ifelse(male == "male", 1, 0),
           working_mom = as.numeric(working_mom),
           immigrant_job = as.numeric(immigrant_job))

head(data_final)

nrow(data_final)

table(data_final$country)
table(data_final$working_mom)
table(data_final$immigrant_job)
summary(data_final$age)
summary(data_final$male)
summary(data_final$education)

```
